title: 神作！！！ 史无前例 倒立的艺术
author: jhmh48735
txt_content:
我昨天晚上灵光一闪，像出了这神作

replies.author: 花钱丶伤
replies.txt_content: 少年真是好创意（为什么放弃治疗？）

replies.author: MC大湿
replies.txt_content: 脖子扭了

replies.author: 幽灵[youling]
replies.txt_content: 顶你，虽然没看

replies.author: Yinyu
replies.txt_content:
[Yinyu]
说实话，
略渣。
{:10_514:}

replies.author: cuking
replies.txt_content: 你为何放弃治疗

replies.author: panfengjason
replies.txt_content: 哪有自己说自己的东西是神作和艺术的

replies.author: suhaijie
replies.txt_content: 脑子被夹了？？？？

replies.author: 乜许﹑該說再见
replies.txt_content: 额，我不知道要怎么形容{:10_492:}
倒立建筑就修一些大点的，像这种正立就已经让人觉得233的就别建了，顺便说一句为何放弃治疗

replies.author: 一二三四五六
replies.txt_content: 只是门和蛋糕无倒立

replies.author: creeper2002
replies.txt_content: 如果加上创造和Dinnerbone的彩蛋似乎会很不错~~
自称神作。。。。。卤煮不是在治疗吗，怎么回来了。。。

replies.author: 呵呵Sama
replies.txt_content: 史无前例 - -。。

replies.author: luliup01
replies.txt_content: 怎么说呢..瞎我一狗眼

replies.author: dapangxiaoxiong
replies.txt_content: 顶，楼主再接再厉

replies.author: dapangxiaoxiong
replies.txt_content: 建议楼主先练好建普通房子，在建倒立的

replies.author: dapangxiaoxiong
replies.txt_content: 史无前例倒是真的，神作没看出来

replies.author: a2455564728
replies.txt_content: 胃疼啊

replies.author: 雷霆※无双
replies.txt_content: 好神的作啊！

replies.author: 我的世界sun123
replies.txt_content:
神作啊！！！
倒挂的垃圾！！！！！！

replies.author: rx碳哆啦
replies.txt_content: 还神作，医院都收留不了你

replies.author: 付款发货
replies.txt_content: 我不是伸手党（地图好无聊啊）

replies.author: Forsworn_
replies.txt_content: 只能说是楼主创意不错(为什么要伤害我们的脖子)

replies.author: yudia
replies.txt_content:
神...作...啊...
楼主真是神作了

replies.author: luckyyong
replies.txt_content: 房屋就算正过来也不好看撒

replies.author: 铁砧~~
replies.txt_content:
花钱丶伤 发表于 2014-2-8 11:24
少年真是好创意（为什么放弃治疗？）
同上
这么复（jian）杂（dan）、你还扯上艺术了！！

replies.author: 人家叫我粽子
replies.txt_content: 外星人  你好
